name: Magic Tapper
description:
This mini-game is my first Unity3D project from scratch, it's a free interpretation of the arcade game "TAPPER" (1983, Bally Midway). It's made in 2D with a "pseudo" 3D effect.

The mechanics are less advanced than in the original game (you can't run in particular), but the concept remains the same.

Controls:

  • Up arrow / Down arrow
  • Space (hold)
  • ESC: quit

The game was made thanks to the assets by:

  • unrulygames.com (characters)
  • openpeeps.com (player character)
  • YaduRajiv / BIT BY BIT BERT (musics)
  • freesound.org (sounds)
  • and the nice rounded font is by https://youssef-habchi.com/
